member.name: T:WineApi.Label

member.name: P:WineApi.Label.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier for the label.

member.name: P:WineApi.Label.Name
member.summary: The name, or description, of the label.

member.name: P:WineApi.Label.Url

member.name: T:WineApi.IUrlInvoker
member.summary: This interface has been introduced specifically to enable better unit testing. The ServiceBase class supports Property Injection via the UrlInvoker proptery i.e. unit tests can pass in a mock object.
member.remarks: Ideally, I wanted this interface to be "internal" but the Castle dynamic proxy generator used by Rhino Mocks requires the type to be public. Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.GeneratorException : Type is not public, so a proxy cannot be generated. Type: WineApi.IUrlInvoker

member.name: M:WineApi.IUrlInvoker.InvokeUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Invoke the given Url and return the resultant JSON response string.
member.param: The Url to be invoked.

member.name: T:WineApi.CommunityReview
member.summary: A community review of a product.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReview.Id
member.summary: The unique (Endeca) id for the publication.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReview.Name
member.summary: The name, or description, of the review or publication.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReview.Score
member.summary: The score given to the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReview.Description
member.summary: The full description of the review.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReview.Url
member.summary: A url to other products that have been reviewed by the same publication.

member.name: T:WineApi.CatalogService
member.summary: Catalog queries give complete access to the Wine.com product catalog, including professional ratings, labels, styles of wines, and all other attributes associated with Wines.

member.name: T:WineApi.ServiceBase
member.summary: This is the base class for each of the service classes e.g. CatalogService.

member.name: M:WineApi.ServiceBase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for use by derived classes.
member.param: The resource type component of the Url.

member.name: M:WineApi.ServiceBase.AppendNameValueToQueryString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Append a name/value pair to the query string component of the overall Url.
member.param: The name of the name/value pair.
The value of the name/value pair.

member.name: M:WineApi.ServiceBase.Execute``1
member.summary: Execute the query. Issue a http request. Read the response which should be a JSON string. Use Json.NET to deserialise the JSON string into the required object graph.
member.typeparam: The type of the object at the root of the object graph.

member.name: M:WineApi.ServiceBase.CheckStatus(WineApi.Status)
member.summary: Check the ReturnCode property of a given Status object. If it is not 0 then throw a WineApiStatusException.
member.param: The Status object to be checked.

member.name: P:WineApi.ServiceBase.UrlInvoker
member.summary: Property Injection - allows unit tests to supply a mock object to override the default (an instance of DefaultUrlInvoker).

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.Offset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "offset" custom parameter to the query.
member.param: The record to start from.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.Size(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "size" custom parameter to the query.
member.param: The number of records to return in a list. Max is 100, default is 5.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.Search(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the "search" custom parameter to the query.
member.param: The term(s) to search for.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.CategoriesFilter(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "categories" filter.
member.param: The category attributes to filter on. Examples would be the red wine attribute, or the cabernet attribute.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.RatingFilter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "rating" filter.
member.param: The lower value of a range of rating scores to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.RatingFilter(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "rating" filter.
member.param: The lower value of a range of rating scores to filter on.
The upper value of a range of rating scores to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.PriceFilter(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "price" filter. Only supported when the state parameter is provided.
member.param: The lower value of a range of price to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.PriceFilter(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "price" filter. Only supported when the state parameter is provided.
member.param: The lower value of a range of price to filter on.
The upper value of a range of price to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.ProductFilter(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "product" filter. When this is specified, full product details are provided.
member.param: The specific products to return.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.State(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the "state" custom parameter to the query. This is optional. If it is not present, retail information will not be displayed.
member.param: The desired ship to state.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.SortBy(WineApi.SortOptions,WineApi.SortDirection)
member.summary: Adds the "sort" custom parameter to the query.
member.param: What sort key should be used when sorting the list.
The direction in which to sort.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.InStock
member.summary: Adds the "instock" custom parameter to the query. This is a convenience method that defaults the value to true.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.InStock(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the "instock" custom parameter to the query. Limit the results to in stock products only (should be coupled with the state parameter).
member.param: true or false.

member.name: M:WineApi.CatalogService.Execute
member.summary: Executes the Catalog query and returns a Catalog object.

member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "categories" filter.

member.name: P:WineApi.Footnote.Id
member.summary: The article identifier.

member.name: P:WineApi.Footnote.Title
member.summary: Descriptive name for the article.

member.name: P:WineApi.Footnote.Url
member.summary: A url to the article on the wine.com website.

member.name: T:WineApi.Product
member.summary: This is the actual product object. When in a list format some of these values will be null. A full object will only be populated when the product identifier is specified in the query.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier for the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Name
member.summary: The product name.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Description
member.summary: Additional information that may accompany the product. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.GeoLocation
member.summary: The location of the grapes, or winery, that produced this wine. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Url
member.summary: The url to the product detail.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.PriceMin
member.summary: The starting point for the price. Prices could be higher in certain markets, but they will never be lower than this price.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.PriceMax
member.summary: The maximum price point across all markets for this product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.PriceRetail
member.summary: The suggested retail price for the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Type
member.summary: Identifies the type of product that is being described. See the list of possible product type options.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Year
member.summary: The year, or vintage of the product. If the product is not a bottle of wine, then the string will be empty. If the product is a bottle of wine, but has no vintage, it will have a designation of "Non-Vintage".

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Appellation
member.summary: The appellation that the product belongs. Note, not all products have appellations. This can be null.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Varietal
member.summary: The varietal that the product belongs to. Note, not all products have a varietal. This can be null.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Vineyard
member.summary: The vineyard that the product belongs to. Note, not all products have a vineyard. This can be null.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.ProductAttributes
member.summary: A collection of additional attributes that define the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Labels
member.summary: A collection of labels that go with the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Ratings
member.summary: A collection of ratings that have been given to the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Retail
member.summary: Retail properties for the product. This is only available when the state is specified, otherwise it is null.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Vintages
member.summary: A list of other vintages of this wine. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: P:WineApi.Product.Community
member.summary: Wine.com community information.

member.name: T:WineApi.Vineyard
member.summary: A vineyard.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vineyard.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier for the vineyard.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vineyard.Name
member.summary: The name of the vineyard.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vineyard.Url
member.summary: The url to the description of the vineyard.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vineyard.ImageUrl
member.summary: The url to an image of the vineyard.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vineyard.GeoLocation
member.summary: The location of the vineyard. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: T:WineApi.Retail
member.summary: This identifies retail values for the purchase of this product. Only available when the destination state is specified using the "state" url value.

member.name: P:WineApi.Retail.Sku
member.summary: The unique sku for the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Retail.InStock
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the product is in stock.

member.name: P:WineApi.Retail.Price
member.summary: Wine.com sales price for the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Retail.Url
member.summary: The url for purchasing this product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Retail.State
member.summary: The desired ship to state.

member.name: T:WineApi.Products
member.summary: This is a list of products.

member.name: P:WineApi.Products.Total
member.summary: The total number of products that match the query. Not all products will be returned.

member.name: P:WineApi.Products.Offset
member.summary: The starting position in the entire list.

member.name: P:WineApi.Products.Url
member.summary: The url to the list of wines.

member.name: P:WineApi.Products.List
member.summary: The actual list of products.

member.name: T:WineApi.ProductAttribute
member.summary: This identifies other attributes that describe the product. Some examples would be "Kosher" or "Collectible" or "Screw Cap".

member.name: P:WineApi.ProductAttribute.Id
member.summary: The unique (Endeca) id for the attribute.

member.name: P:WineApi.ProductAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name, or description, of the attribute.

member.name: P:WineApi.ProductAttribute.Url
member.summary: A url to other products that have the same attribute.

member.name: P:WineApi.ProductAttribute.ImageUrl
member.summary: The url to an icon for the product attribute.

member.name: T:WineApi.GeoLocation
member.summary: Identifies a latitude and longitude for the location of the grapes, or winery, that produced the wine.

member.name: P:WineApi.GeoLocation.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude of the location. If this data does not exist (or you do not have access to it), the value returned will be -360.

member.name: P:WineApi.GeoLocation.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude of the location. If this data does not exist (or you do not have access to it), the value returned will be -360.

member.name: P:WineApi.GeoLocation.Url
member.summary: The url to a map of the wine.

member.name: T:WineApi.Article
member.summary: An article.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Id
member.summary: The article identifier.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Title
member.summary: Descriptive name for the article.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Abstract
member.summary: A short description, or abstract, for the article.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Content
member.summary: The article content. This is only populated when the article identifier is specified in the filter. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Url
member.summary: A url to the article on the wine.com website.

member.name: P:WineApi.Article.Footnotes
member.summary: Footnotes to other articles that are related to this article.

member.name: T:WineApi.ReturnCode
member.summary: A numerical code that identifies the status. A number of 0 means everything worked correctly.

member.name: F:WineApi.ReturnCode.Success
member.summary: Everything worked, no problems.

member.name: F:WineApi.ReturnCode.CriticalError
member.summary: A critical error was encountered. This is due to a bug in the service. Please notify wine.com ASAP to correct this issue.

member.name: F:WineApi.ReturnCode.UnableToAuthorize
member.summary: Unable to Authorize. We cannot authorize this account.

member.name: F:WineApi.ReturnCode.NoAccess
member.summary: No Access. Account does not have access to this service.

member.name: T:WineApi.Community
member.summary: This object contains summaries the community content, as well as access to the more detailed community information.

member.name: P:WineApi.Community.Reviews
member.summary: A collection of reviews that community members have written.

member.name: P:WineApi.Community.Url
member.summary: The url to the product detail page that contains the community notes.

member.name: T:WineApi.Vintage
member.summary: This links a product to other vintages, and lists some additional attributes of these products.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vintage.Id
member.summary: The product id of the related vintage.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vintage.Name
member.summary: The year, or vintage, of the related product.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vintage.Ratings
member.summary: A collection of ratings that have been given to this specific vintage.

member.name: P:WineApi.Vintage.Url
member.summary: The url to the product detail for this vintage.

member.name: T:WineApi.SortOptions
member.summary: Supported sort options.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Popularity
member.summary: The products are sorted by popularity.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Rating
member.summary: The products are sorted by their top professional rating score.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Vintage
member.summary: The products are sorted by their vintage.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Winery
member.summary: The products are sorted by the winery name.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Name
member.summary: The products are sorted alphabetically, by the product name.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Price
member.summary: The products are sorted by price. This is only available when the state parameter is specified.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.Saving
member.summary: The products are sorted by the amount they are discounted. This is only available when the state parameter is specified.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortOptions.JustIn
member.summary: The products are sorted by when wine.com first received them.

member.name: T:WineApi.Area
member.summary: This defines a high level area that the wine belongs to. An example would be "New World", or "France".

member.name: P:WineApi.Area.Id
member.summary: A unique (Endeca) identifier for the area.

member.name: P:WineApi.Area.Name
member.summary: The name of the area.

member.name: P:WineApi.Area.Url
member.summary: The url to the other products in the same area.

member.name: P:WineApi.Area.Parent
member.summary: If there is a higher area classification, this will be populated with the parent. An example could be an area called "Old World" which would be the parent of an area called "France". This could be null.

member.name: T:WineApi.Region
member.summary: A wine region.

member.name: P:WineApi.Region.Id
member.summary: A unique (Endeca) identifier for the region.

member.name: P:WineApi.Region.Name
member.summary: The name of the region.

member.name: P:WineApi.Region.Url
member.summary: The url to the other products in the same region.

member.name: P:WineApi.Region.Area
member.summary: The area that the region belongs to. This could be null.

member.name: P:WineApi.Catalog.Status

member.name: T:WineApi.Appellation

member.name: P:WineApi.Appellation.Name

member.name: T:WineApi.WineApiServiceException

member.name: P:WineApi.Vintages.List
member.summary: A specific vintage that the product is related to.

member.name: T:WineApi.SortDirection
member.summary: The direction in which to sort.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortDirection.Ascending
member.summary: Sort in ascending order.

member.name: F:WineApi.SortDirection.Descending

member.name: T:WineApi.Config
member.summary: Use this (singleton) class to configure WineApi.

member.name: P:WineApi.Config.ApiKey
member.summary: The key given to the developer that is requesting the resource.

member.name: P:WineApi.Config.Version
member.summary: The version of the API to use.

member.name: P:WineApi.Config.AffiliateId
member.summary: After signing up with LinkShare, use the "affiliateId" parameter to pass your affiliate code to the API. All links will be updated to track the sales you drive and you will receive a monthly check from LinkShare! When you sign up with LinkShare you will see the specifics of payments.

member.name: T:WineApi.CategoryMapService
member.summary: This query returns the various categories and their children. These categories can then be used to retrieve products using the "filter" option.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.CategoriesFilter(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "categories" filter.
member.param: The category attributes to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.RatingFilter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "rating" filter.
member.param: The lower value of a range of rating scores to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.RatingFilter(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the "filter" custom parameter to the query. Specifically, it adds the "rating" filter.
member.param: The lower value of a range of rating scores to filter on.
The upper value of a range of rating scores to filter on.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.Search(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the "search" custom parameter to the query.
member.param: The term(s) to search for.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.Show(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Lists all items in the given categories.
member.param: The categories to be returned.

member.name: M:WineApi.CategoryMapService.Execute
member.summary: Executes the CategoryMap query and returns a CategoryMap object.

member.name: T:WineApi.Book
member.summary: A book is defined as a section of the Wine.com reference library. An example would be "Wine Basics" or "Selecting Wines".

member.name: P:WineApi.Book.Id
member.summary: The book identifier.

member.name: P:WineApi.Book.Title
member.summary: Descriptive name for the book.

member.name: P:WineApi.Book.Articles
member.summary: The articles that make up the book.

member.name: T:WineApi.Refinement
member.summary: A refinement is the actual category value.

member.name: P:WineApi.Refinement.Id
member.summary: The refinement identifier (Endeca Dimension Value Id).

member.name: P:WineApi.Refinement.Name
member.summary: Describe name for the refinement. "Red Wine" for example.

member.name: P:WineApi.Refinement.Url
member.summary: A url to products that map to this category refinement. This includes the original filter. For example, if you are looking for all child categories for the category Red Wines, the Merlot value will include the Red Wine value.

member.name: T:WineApi.CategoryMap
member.summary: This object is returned when a call is made to the Category Map API. It returns possible category matches based off a provided query.

member.name: P:WineApi.CategoryMap.Status
member.summary: Contains status and debugging information.

member.name: P:WineApi.CategoryMap.Categories
member.summary: A list of categories that match the provided query.

member.name: T:WineApi.Status
member.summary: This object is returned with every query. It contains a status code, and any debugging information that might accompany an error.

member.name: P:WineApi.Status.ReturnCode
member.summary: A numerical code that identifies the status. A number of 0 means everything worked correctly.

member.name: P:WineApi.Status.Messages
member.summary: Returns a list of messages that contain debugging information to assist with correcting the issue.

member.name: T:WineApi.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.ReturnCodeCriticalError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A critical error was encountered. This is due to a bug in the service. Please notify wine.com ASAP to correct this issue..

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.ReturnCodeNoAccess
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No Access. Account does not have access to this service..

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.ReturnCodeSuccess
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Everything worked, no problems..

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.ReturnCodeUnableToAuthorize
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to Authorize. We cannot authorize this account..

member.name: P:WineApi.Resources.WineApiServiceExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to invoke the Wine.com API service for the resource, "{0}"..

member.name: T:WineApi.Reference
member.summary: This object is returned when a call is made to the Reference Library API.

member.name: P:WineApi.Reference.Status
member.summary: Contains status and debugging information.

member.name: P:WineApi.Reference.Books
member.summary: A list of reference sections, or books.

member.name: T:WineApi.CommunityReviews
member.summary: Summaries all of the community reviews.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReviews.HighestScore
member.summary: The highest review score given to the product.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReviews.List
member.summary: A collection of reviews that have been given to the product. Only available with "partner" access.

member.name: P:WineApi.CommunityReviews.Url
member.summary: The url to the full list of reviews.
